name: Freshly-Picked Tingle’s Rosy Rupeeland
description:
Freshly-Picked Tingle’s Rosy Rupeeland is an adventure game developed by Vanpool. It came out on 02-09-2006. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Freshly-Picked Tingle’s Rosy Rupeeland on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Kensuke Tanabe. Taro Kudo and Tarō Kudō directed the game. Masanori Adachi scored the game.
